Model: Use manifold learning to project data into intrinsic low-dimensional space before applying LDA to reduce noise from irrelevant dimensions
Replace global covariance with locally adaptive covariance matrices estimated from k-nearest neighbors in feature space
Introduce sparse regularization on discriminant directions to automatically select relevant features while maintaining interpretability
